meta.Summary:: MAIB report on the fatal injuries to a crewman while securing a tug's tow wire on board the bulk carrier Wah Shan on the River Humber on 2 October 2012. Report No 18/2013. Published 17 July 2013.

title: Accident Investigation Report 18/2013
raw_html:
Report name:

Wah Shan
Incident date:
02 October 2012
Category:
Merchant vessels
Summary:
MAIB report on the fatal injuries to a crewman while securing a tug's tow wire on board the bulk carrier Wah Shan on the River Humber on 2 October 2012. Report No 18/2013. Published 17 July 2013.

body:
MAIB report on the fatal injuries to a crewman while securing a tug's tow wire on board the bulk carrier Wah Shan on the River Humber on 2 October 2012. Report No 18/2013. Published 17 July 2013.

  
[ASSET_TAG](#ASSET0) (5,242.66 kb) 

A Safety Flyer was also produced for this incident and can be viewed on our website:  
[Read Safety Flyer](http://maib.gov.uk/publications/accident_flyers/accident_flyers_2013/wah_shan_flyer.cfm)
